member.summary: Enum for different types of worker threads

member.name: F:Microsoft.WebSolutionsPlatform.Event.WorkerThreadType.None
member.summary: Not defined

member.name: F:Microsoft.WebSolutionsPlatform.Event.WorkerThreadType.ListenerThread
member.summary: This is the thread listening for new events to the queue

member.name: F:Microsoft.WebSolutionsPlatform.Event.WorkerThreadType.CommunicatorThread
member.summary: This is the thread that communicates with the parent and children machines in the mesh

member.name: F:Microsoft.WebSolutionsPlatform.Event.WorkerThreadType.RePublisherThread
member.summary: This is the thread that takes incoming events from a parent/child machine and publishes them to this machine.

member.name: F:Microsoft.WebSolutionsPlatform.Event.WorkerThreadType.SubscriptionMgrThread
member.summary: This is the thread that manages the subscription routing table

member.name: F:Microsoft.WebSolutionsPlatform.Event.WorkerThreadType.PersisterThread
member.summary: This is the thread that persists events to the file system

member.name: F:Microsoft.WebSolutionsPlatform.Event.WorkerThreadType.ManagerThread
member.summary: This is the thread that monitors the health of the other threads and restarts threads as needed
